name: Rogue Royale
description:
Can you claim 'Victory Royale' in this top-down shooter Rogue-Lite?

Tips:

  • Full screen mode is recommended.
  • Healing has a 5 second cool down.
  • Not all weapons are equally good on the battlefield.
  • Sometimes, running is a valid option.

Controls:

  • WASD keys to move.
  • Q or scroll wheel to swap weapons.
  • R to Reload.
  • F to use a healing potion.
  • i to open inventory.
  • Space to pick up items.

Known issues:

  • The AI can be buggy and loves to get stuck on walls.
  • Sometimes the game will end while 1 enemy still remains alive.
  • No tutorial.

Make for the 7 day Rogue Like Game Jam.
